item.title: Road has been blocked for sometime, 21st February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blakeney Road, Beckenham, Greater London

item.title: Drain collapsing, 21st February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Market Place, Bermondsey, Greater London
